page.title: 17SURVEY OF TRAFFIC ON A9
page.content: We did a survey of the traffic on the A9 which runs close to the school. It was not a very good day,it was very misty but we stood inside the school grounds with our clip boards and noted the vehicles which passed in one hour. We went out in pairs,each pair staying for 10minutes only going back into the school when the next pair took over. These are the types and numbers of vehicles that passed in that hour; 457 cars,223 lorries, 49 vans, 16 coaches, 7 land rovers and 2 motor bikes. A total of 754 vehicles on a very dull day. I am sure that there would have been even more if it had been a lovely sunny day or if the survey had been done at the weekend instead of a school day.We really enjoyed doing the survey. We did not realise that there would be so many vehicles although we knew that the A9 is a very busy road.
